name: Cistern of the First Hill
description:
Acts as a Cistern. Unlocks the Pilgrim Flask ability on non-siege military units, which can be activated to increase health regeneration by 25 per second for 10 seconds.
Flasks refill every 45 seconds to a maximum of 10 active flasks.
